description: Welcome to 4686 Fernglen Place, located in the desirable Greentree Village community of Burnaby. This well-situated home offers a practical layout suited to families and long-term owners seeking comfort, convenience, and value. The neighbourhood is known for its quiet, tree-lined streets, strong community feel, and proximity to parks, schools, and everyday amenities. Enjoy easy access to shopping, transit, and major routes connecting you to Metrotown, Brentwood, and Lougheed. A solid opportunity in an established Burnaby neighbourhood with enduring appeal.
